name: KABENAGURI
description:
I like to watch live fighting game videos.
However, I dislike playing fighting games.
Because the stress of losing in a fighting game drives me crazy.
I made this fighting game 【KABENAGURI】 to escape from that stress.

【KABENAGURI】 is a game in which you punch a wall for one minute.
You can attack the wall as much as you want.
You can attack as much as you want.
Take all the stress you usually accumulate and throw it against the wall.
The damage on the wall will be your score, and you can aim for the top ranking!

In order to bring you closer to the feel of a fighting game, you can use a single attack button for both weak and strong attacks, and there are also command moves that are familiar to players of fighting games.

Let`s KABENAGURI !!
